[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Function: primary_apt_store()] [Address prediction] Can an attacker compute victim's primary_apt_store address and front-run their store creation to claim it first? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Cross-account confusion] Can identical FungibleStoreResource values across different accounts be exploited to confuse transaction routing and steal funds? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Shared aggregator] Can multiple accounts share the same AggregatorResource instance, allowing one account to manipulate another's balance? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: MigrationFlag] [Premature migration] Can MigrationFlag be set before the target account is ready, causing migration to fail and lock funds permanently? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: MigrationFlag] [Rollback vulnerability] After migration is complete, can MigrationFlag be reset to allow duplicate migrations and double fund allocation? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Interaction: Coin + FungibleAsset] [Dual balance] During migration, can an account maintain both coin and fungible_asset balances, enabling double-spending by exploiting both systems? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: MigrationFlag] [Migration timing] Can an attacker front-run migration transactions to drain funds from coin balance before migration locks it? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Reentrancy] If balance updates trigger callbacks to metadata contracts, can reentrancy allow recursive withdrawals exceeding balance? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Callback race] Can concurrent balance updates and metadata callbacks create race conditions that violate balance invariants? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Function: metadata()] [Malicious metadata] Can metadata() return address of a malicious contract that exploits the caller when accessed? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Function: new()] [Panic on invalid input] Does FungibleStoreResource::new() panic on invalid metadata addresses, potentially halting consensus if called during block execution? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Function: balance()] [Panic on dereference] Can self.balance.get() panic in edge cases, causing transaction failures that validators handle inconsistently? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Function: primary_apt_store()] [Derivation failure] If create_derived_object_address fails (e.g., invalid input), does primary_apt_store() handle the error gracefully or panic? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Balance + 0] Can adding 0 to balance trigger unexpected behavior in edge cases like frozen accounts? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Balance - 0] Can subtracting 0 from balance bypass frozen checks or other withdrawal restrictions? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Max value arithmetic] When balance equals u64::MAX, can any arithmetic operation cause overflow even without addition? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Proxy stores] Can an attacker create proxy FungibleStoreResource that delegates to victim's store, draining funds through unauthorized access? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Function: metadata()] [Delegated metadata] Can metadata address point to another FungibleStoreResource, creating delegation chains that confuse ownership tracking? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Byzantine validator] Can a Byzantine validator (<1/3) propose blocks with inconsistent FungibleStoreResource states to partition the network? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Function: primary_apt_store()] [Validator divergence] Can different validators compute different primary_apt_store addresses due to implementation bugs, causing consensus failure? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: ConcurrentFungibleBalanceResource] [Aggregator poisoning] Can a validator inject malicious AggregatorResource state that corrupts balances across the network when propagated? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Time-of-check] Can frozen status be checked at transaction start but changed before balance modification, creating TOCTOU race? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: MigrationFlag] [Time-based migration] Can MigrationFlag timing be exploited to enable migrations only during specific epochs, blocking legitimate users? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [State root calculation] Does FungibleStoreResource participate correctly in Jellyfish Merkle tree state root computation? Can exclusion cause state divergence? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/fungible_store.rs] [Struct: FungibleStoreResource] [Pruning vulnerability] When historical states are pruned, can FungibleStoreResource references break, causing failures in long-running transactions? (High)
